label: 三毒
対訳語: The Three Poisons which destroy the Roots of Merit
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: (zengon, kusala-mūla): (1) covetousness (ton, rāga; note Mujū's poem on this item in S&P 3:8); (2) anger, ill will, envy (shin, dvesa, pratigha); and (3) delusion, ignorance (chi, moha). [善根、貪、瞋、癡]
